result.execSummary:
The defendant Curtis M Ziems was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Curtis M Ziems is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Curtis M Ziems was found guilty of Possession of Controlled Substance, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Sauk County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes:
With Huber privileges.  Jail to commence on or before July 15, 2016.  Submit to DNA sample.  Defendant may transfer jail sentence to another county and upon approval.  Any continuance of jail must be accompanied by medical information.
Consecutive to: any other sentences.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Curtis M Ziems

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Curtis M Ziems in court.  Linda Ann Hoffman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant was unable to attend the PTC and would request to resolve the matter today.  State gives recommendation.  Defendant would like to take the offer and resolve it today.  Matter to be recalled.    No contest Plea entered, advised of constitutional rights, plea accepted by Court.  Court finds Defendant guilty.  Court imposes sentence.
Count 1:
$243.00 fine or costs and $200.00 DNA surcharge, 60 days to pay or set up a payment plan.
5 Days in Sauk County Jail, with huber, consecutive.  Commence on or before July 15, 2016 at 7:30 p.m.  Defendant may transfer jail sentence to another county and upon approval.  Any continuance of jail must be accompanied by medical information.
Submit to DNA sample.
Paperwork handed in court.
Count 2 Dismissed.
Return date on May 19, 2016 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Curtis M Ziems in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court questions DE.  DE states what he wants for a resolution.  Court suggests a reset and advises DE of right to counsel.  Court resets.  Bond continued.  Return date scheduled for May 19, 2016 at 01:00 pm.
Return date on April 27, 2016 at 01:00 pm.

Pre-trial conference at 03-11-2016 11:00 am.
Return date at 03-24-2016 01:00 pm.

Defendant Curtis M Ziems by video from LEC with attorney Puck Tsai.  Defendant Curtis M Ziems in custody.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waives reading of complaint. Advised rights to an attorney.  State requests cash bond.  Atty Tsai responds.  File set for pre-trial conference/return date.  $250.00 signature bond set.  Special bond conditions as follows:  Not to possess any controlled substances w/o valid prescription.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 11, 2016 at 11:00 am.  Return date scheduled for March 24, 2016 at 01:00 pm.
